tutorial.title: Usage
tutorial.content:
1. + button use to add famliy members of selected data.
  2. e button use to edit selected data.
  3. - buttom use to remove selectd data.

tutorial.title: JavaScript
Syntax (arguments)
tutorial.content:
new DataTree(element)
new DataTree(element,data)
new DataTree(element,data,warning)

data = { name: 'name', d[ { name: 'name', d[{...}] ,...}] }

tutorial.title: element
tutorial.content: Give DOM element, this element is target place to create DataTree.

tutorial.title: data (Optional)
tutorial.content: Give object, It's use to load DataTree conent of the data.

tutorial.title: warning (Optional)
tutorial.content: It's booleen data type (true or false) and default value is true. confirm message control parameter. If given value is true, when try to delete data confirm popup asking 'Are sure to delete'.

tutorial.title: DataTree Methods
tutorial.content:
DataTree.getData()
It's use to get data of DataTree and its retrun object.
  • demo : click here print to console log
  • code : tree.getData();
DataTree.render()
It's use to reprint html element.
  • code : tree.render();

tutorial.title: Upcoming Update in DataTree
tutorial.content: • Different theme (design options) comming soon. Give your supports.
